messages.speech:
Making sure that seizures are correctly diagnosed, and that treatment plans are followed, minimises further risks. So, you are already on a path that will help you on your journey.

And don't worry, I will be here to answer your questions and just a phone call away if you need the comfort of a human voice.

So that I can point you to the right direction, I'd need a bit of information about your situation. Are you happy with that?
